trans-unit.source: Specifies how an image is positioned within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> 內定位影像。

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的值中使用這個列舉型別的成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializePictureBoxAndButton` method from the form's constructor or Load-event handling method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到 Windows Form 並呼叫`InitializePictureBoxAndButton`從表單的建構函式或載入事件處理方法的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> is sized equal to the size of the image that it contains.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> 的大小調整成與其所包含影像的大小相等。

trans-unit.source: The image is displayed in the center if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> is larger than the image.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> 大於影像，影像即置中顯示。

trans-unit.source: If the image is larger than the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />, the picture is placed in the center of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> and the outside edges are clipped.
trans-unit.target: 如果影像大於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />，圖片即放在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> 的中央，而外緣被裁剪。

trans-unit.source: The image is placed in the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 影像放置在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> 的左上角。

trans-unit.source: The image is clipped if it is larger than the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> it is contained in.
trans-unit.target: 如果影像大於包含它的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />，就會裁剪影像。

trans-unit.source: The image within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> is stretched or shrunk to fit the size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> 內的影像會延伸或縮小，以調整成最適合 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> 的大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the image is increased or decreased maintaining the size ratio.
trans-unit.target: 不論是增大或縮小，影像大小都維持大小比例。
